label: ham
subject:
Re: ..weeding out bad debs off mirrors, was: Can I get some help,
 please?
body: 204 (return) [ Quo testimonio boni se quidpiam praestitisse opinabantur. Yet Mirchond must have condemned their zeal, since he approved the legal toleration of the Magi, cui (the fire temple) peracto singulis annis censu uti sacra Mohammedis lege cautum, ab omnibus molestiis ac oneribus libero esse licuit.]
